## Step 5: Finish work

With our first blog post finished, let's merge it into the main branch.

### :keyboard: Activity: Merge blog post

A pull request has been automatically created for you! ðŸŽ‰

1. In the top navigation, select the **Pull requests** tab.

1. You should see a pull request titled "Complete blog post with Markdown" that merges `start-blog` into `main`.

1. Review the changes in the pull request to see all your work.

1. Scroll down and click the **Merge pull request** button.

1. Click **Confirm merge**.

1. With the pull request merged, Mona will prepare the final review. Nice work! You are done! ðŸŽ‰
